imdb.plot outline: In the past years French came to Mainz repeatedly, although as enemies or as friends. Some stayed causing a certain French lightness and zest for life in today's Rheinhessen.
imdb.title: Genuss ohne Grenzen
plot: In the past years French came to Mainz repeatedly, although as enemies or as friends. Some stayed causing a certain French lightness and zest for life in today's Rheinhessen.
